text: Ekaterina Vladimirovna Bolotova (; born 12 December 1992) is a Russian badminton player. She was the women's doubles silver medalist at the 2015 Baku European Games with partner Evgeniya Kosetskaya,, and later won a bronze medal in 2019 Minsk with Alina Davletova. == Achievements == === European Games === Women's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! It is a series of badminton tournaments sanctioned by the Badminton World Federation (BWF) since 2007. Women's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font- size: 90%;" ! Year ! Tournament !
